movies.title: Mama, There's a Man in Your Bed
movies.plot: This is a story about a rich white man who falls in love with Juliet the full figured black woman who cleans his offices at night. After learning of his wife's affair with one of his work partners and the sabotage of his business he is left broken and is taken in by Juliet who then shows him what real true love is ... If you have not yet seen this movie then you are missing out on what real true love means, it does not matter what color you are, or what size you are it's how your heart feels and that's what this beautiful love story shows us all ... a must see!
movies.simplePlot: A company president gets framed with a food-poisoning scandal and the only person who can help him is the evening cleaning-woman, who always seems to be at the right place at the right time.

biography.bio: Daniel Auteuil was born on January 24, 1950 in Algiers, Alger, France. He is an actor and director, known for Caché (2005), 36th Precinct (2004) and Un Coeur en Hiver (1992). He has been married to Aude Ambroggi since July 22, 2006. They have one child. He was previously married to Emmanuelle Béart and Anne Jousset.
biography.name: Daniel Auteuil

biography.bio: Firmine Richard was born on September 25, 1947 in Pointe-à-Pitre, Guadeloupe, France. She is an actress, known for 8 femmes (2002), Ensemble, c'est tout (2007) and La première étoile (2009).
biography.name: Firmine Richard

biography.bio: Pierre Vernier was born on May 25, 1931 in Saint-Jean-d'Angély, Charente-Maritime, France as Pierre Rayer. He is an actor, known for Under the Sand (2000), Le Chef (2012) and Adieu De Gaulle adieu (2009).
biography.name: Pierre Vernier

biography.bio: Maxime Leroux was born on March 26, 1951 in Sainte-Adresse, Seine-Inférieure [now Seine-Maritime], France as Maxime Noël Michel Leroux. He was an actor, known for Camille Claudel (1988), Colonel Chabert (1994) and Mama, There's a Man in Your Bed (1989). He died on January 24, 2010 in Rouen, Seine-Maritime, Haute-Normandie, France.
biography.name: Maxime Leroux

biography.bio: Gilles Privat is an actor, known for Serial Lover (1998), Le temps de l'aventure (2013) and La crise (1992).
biography.name: Gilles Privat

biography.bio: Catherine Salviat was born on January 21, 1947 in Paris, France. She is an actress and casting director, known for Les garçons et Guillaume, à table! (2013), Les corps impatients (2003) and Mama, There's a Man in Your Bed (1989).
biography.name: Catherine Salviat

biography.bio: Muriel Combeau is an actress, known for Avocats & associés (1998), Mama, There's a Man in Your Bed (1989) and Ce chien couché à ses pieds (2012).
biography.name: Muriel Combeau

biography.bio: Alexandre Basse is an actor, known for Mama, There's a Man in Your Bed (1989).
biography.name: Alexandre Basse

biography.bio: Aissatou Bah is an actress, known for Mama, There's a Man in Your Bed (1989).
biography.name: Aissatou Bah

biography.bio: Mamadou Bah is an actress, known for Mama, There's a Man in Your Bed (1989).
biography.name: Mamadou Bah

biography.bio: Marina M'Boa Ngong is an actress, known for Mama, There's a Man in Your Bed (1989).
biography.name: Marina M'Boa Ngong

biography.bio: Sambou Tati is an actor, known for Mama, There's a Man in Your Bed (1989), Le funambule (2008) and Lascars (2001).
biography.name: Sambou Tati

biography.bio: Nicolas Serreau is an actor, known for Chaos (2001), La crise (1992) and Mama, There's a Man in Your Bed (1989).
biography.name: Nicolas Serreau

biography.bio: Alain Tretout is an actor, known for Mama, There's a Man in Your Bed (1989), Le malade imaginaire (1990) and Le docteur Ox (2004).
biography.name: Alain Tretout

biography.bio: Alain Fromager is an actor, known for Mesrine Part 2: Public Enemy #1 (2008), Indochine (1992) and Le mac (2010).
biography.name: Alain Fromager
